|lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2605L;SiGe, 2605L, 250GP;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85402;SKY85402, UM3JA, 1334 MY;3; ,,, Cable Modem Power Amplifier;Maxim;MAX3521;MAXIM, 3521E, TP316, +NSAA;1; ,,, MoCA 2.0 Controller;ViXs;XConnex 1030;ViXs, XConnex 1030, 213XDLCJA11, NNNNN4C5NNNN, KYF5T, 1338, MALAYSIA;2; ,,, MoCA 2.0 RF Transciever;ViXs;XConnex 1000;ViXs, XConneX 1000, 213XCDCHA13, NNNNN2A5NNNN, PSR667.00, 1340, MALAYSIA;1; ,,, DECT SoC;DSP Group;DCX81;DSPGroup, DCX81AC0BFAE3ENC, (C)(M)2010 DSPG, PMA252.04 A, TMC129B0002A 1239, TMCT10D;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, battery backup |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=HOME-XXXX-2.4, HOME-XXXX-5 |default_ssid_regex=^HOME-[A-F0-9]{4}-2.4$,,, ^HOME-[A-F0-9]{4}-5$ |default_ip=10.0.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|DOCSIS 3.0 24x4 Wireless Residential Voice Gateway}} {{CableModemSpec|down_c=24|up_c=4}} <small> The default SSID formats assumed used, as well as the likely default IP, are per the sample FCC label. :The sample label bears the '''Unihan Corporation''' (a ''[[Pegatron]]'' subsidiary) name. The FCC docs indicate this device will be used with {{Approved by service|Comcast}}'s ('''Xfinity''' branded) service </small> *[http://www.dslreports.com/hardware/Cisco-DPC3941-h4021 ''Cisco DPC3941'' on '''dslreports.com'''] :Chipset: [[Intel Puma]] 6 / [[QCA]] QCA9880-BR4A :RAM: 1GB DRAM, Flash: 128MB :Dimensions: 268x269x55 mm (WxHxD) :Weight: 1.2 kg
